name: Flower Painter Pro
description:
procedural flower petal and palette generation. also plays eerie sounds.
made for #procjam

left click draws
right click resets
game will auto-run if left alone

if you like my work, please consider supporting me either by leaving a tip here or becoming my patron.

your support helps me make more games! patrons will be able to see in-progress builds for my current project and future games, and help me make decisions that impact design. your support also means I can make my games better by adding extra areas, abilities, or puzzles, and can commission custom music!
